text: Piper clathratum is a species of pepper plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== * Santiana, J. & Pitman, N. 2004. IUCN Red List: Piper clathratum, Downloaded on 23 August 2007. * All IUCN Red List of Threatened Species clathratum Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Critically endangered flora of South America Category:Taxa named by Casimir de Candolle Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Piper clathratum
